Description:
STUNNING EX-DISPLAY IN BLUE-CHIP LOCATION
A lifestyle of complete luxury, comfort and convenience is assured to the lucky buyer of this stunning Henley ex-display home. Boasting a simple yet practical floor plan, this well-designed home boasts a smooth integration between the stunning kitchen domain through to family meals area and enclosed decked alfresco entertaining area to give the home a free-flowing feel and provide the very best in family entertaining.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 massive bedrooms, huge walk-in robe & deluxe ensuite to a large master bedroom, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, super-sized meals & family area perfect for large scale family gatherings, fully equipped kitchen with great storage, 900mm stainless steel appliances & ample Ceasar stone bench space.
Step outside and be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco deck which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides a safe low maintenance haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Loaded with high end features, including ducted heating/refrigerative cooling, plantation shutters, stunning spotted gum hardwood floors, motorized security shutters throughout, and so much more!
Insights: 5 Langford Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Double Ensuite Delight in Mt Aitken!
Welcome to this well presented double storey 33.5 sq (approx.) modern home in the heart of the highly sought after Mt. Aitken Estate.
Wide entrance that leads you into the big lounge and study nook along with massive family area with lots of natural light flowing on to separate meals and well-appointed designer kitchen finished with waterfall stone benchtops and 900mm cooktop. Fully equipped ensuite downstairs along with a separate powder room is an extra feature that will leave you impressed. Walk upstairs to the convenience of other 4 bedrooms including one full ensuite and others with built in wardrobes. There is a big rumpus / Leisure area upstairs which opens up to a beautiful huge balcony with panoramic views of Craigieburn and city to enjoy.
Quality inclusions of this property includes high ceilings on both the levels along with refrigerated cooling and downlights throughout the house along with 40 mm stone benchtops in all the bathrooms. Rain shower heads with wall to wall tiles in all the bathrooms are some of the luxury inclusions with a separate kitchen in the garage for big family's catering needs. Fully landscaped front and backyard along with a separate shed will compliment this already feature packed dwelling of exceptional quality.
Easy access to Mt. Aitken Road, Craigieburn Central Shopping precinct, Splash Aqua Park, Pelican Childcare and quality public and private schools in the area along with public transport at your doorstep, this property is centrally located for ease and convenience.
Built with high inclusions and eye for perfection this home will be a prized possession for one lucky buyer. Inspection is must for luxury home buyers with taste for perfection!!
Additional Inclusions:
-5 Bedrooms (2 En suites)
-High Ceilings
-Study
-2 Kitchens
-Security cameras
-Alarm system
-Refrigerated Cooling
-Ducted heating
-Stone benchtops
-Tool shed
Call us today!
Ricky Singh 0415 167 144
Bhupinder Mata 0433 141 284

Description:
The Definition Of A Family Home!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 14 Emerald Circuit Craigieburn. Situated on a 550m2 block and located in a family friendly neighbourhood, this is the ideal place to call home.
This family delight offers five bedrooms with one master showcasing a walk in robe and ensuite, two bedrooms with walk in robes and a further two bedrooms with built in robes, all serviced by a main central bathroom with bath.
Step further inside and be overwhelmed with the gleaming kitchen with caeserstone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and plenty of bench and storage space which overlooks the spacious meals and family area. This spacious home also offers a separate formal lounge and a rumpus room in the back ideal for the kids own retreat.
With a spacious double and a half garage plus the added bonus of a drive through garage to the backyard there is plenty of space for additional cars, jet skis, trailers etc.
This home is packed with full of additional extras including zoned ducted heating and evaporative cooling, alarm, intercom, shed, day and night blinds and much more.
Positioned a large block with plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy and located in a lovely location what more can you want? Secure this opportunity before it is gone.
Insights: 14 Emerald Circuit, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Desirable Home in Sought After Location !!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this beautifully presented family home situated within the Highlands Estate. Offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features this property will be sure to impress all.
NOTE: DUE TO COVID-19 PLEASE REGISTER FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION
Please email or call to register for your private inspection for one person ONLY.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 3 Spacious Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with Full Ensuite. Other 2 Bedroom with BIR). Each Bedrooms with Separate Split System
- KITCHEN: - Stylish gourmet kitchen with Stone Bench Tops, Modern Stainless-Steel appliances & Dishwasher.
- LIVING AREAS: - Formal Lounge and Separate Large Family and Meals Area. Perfect for family gatherings and entertaining.
- PARKING: Double Car Garage with Remote Control and Internal Access.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Ducted Gas Heating, Split System Cooling, Alarm System.
-LOCATION: Within close proximity to all local amenities including Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Precinct & Hotel and just a stone throw away from local parkland, public transport, schools & sporting facilities. With everything you could want already completed, this home truly is ready to move in and enjoy.
SALE BY TENDER DATE CLOSING ON 9 JUNE 2020 @ 6 PM (unless sold prior)
Do not miss out. Call Gordon Garg on 0433897397 at Universal Real Estate Vic to book Private Inspection.

Description:
Enchanting Home in Prized Location
Perfectly positioned in one of Craigieburn's favourite neighbourhoods, this brick home has been meticulously maintained and offers a wonderful opportunity for those looking to modernise. Impeccably presented, the home's current floorplan comprises three large bedrooms all with built in robes, spotless two way bathroom with spa, light-filled lounge and dining area accompanied by a neat oversized kitchen complete with dishwasher. Additional features include ducted heating and split system cooling, covered alfresco area, plus an expansive backyard garden with single garage and drive thru access. Tucked away in a blissfully quiet Hamilton Park cul-de-sac and within Walking distance to local shops & buses, Craigieburn Primary School & childcare centre, it also offers easy access to popular parks & Malcolm Creek trails as well as all Craigieburn's major shopping centres.

Description:
Settled Land - Ready to Build!!
This is a fantastic opportunity to own a piece of land in Cragieburn's Aston Estate. Offering approx. 375m2 of land approximately in the greatest development sight of Cragieburn. Key features of the block include 12.5m frontages and approx 30m depth. The suburb has been rapidly expanding in terms of population growth as well as facilities for many years now, a very small amount of blocks vacant for possession. This vacant land, titled and ready to build your dream home is only moments away from transport, primary & secondary schools, childcares, local shops, shopping centre, cafes, sporting facilities, park lands and many more...
Act fast and get your hands on this amazing block of land today!
Contact your Agents now!

Description:
AMAZING VALUE - $479,000
668m2 ( Approx ) , 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom
If location's important then look no further. At the end of a quiet cul de sac, walk to everything the area has to offer, including schools, shopping, sporting facilities, medical centres, and the train station. The possibilities are endless with this this hidden gem, an ideal first home, a great addition to your investment portfolio, or possibly redevelop (subject to council approval). With plenty of space for a young and growing family, the property has spacious living areas and good size bedrooms (master with ensuite), a lovely secluded courtyard, carport, and a large back garden. In good comfortable condition to move in and enjoy then renovate to your heart's content later.
Inspection is a must very keen vendor will meet the market.

Description:
Work From Home With Separate Home Office Space
Offering a perfect balance of space, style convenience and location, this modern 3-bedroom townhouse delivers on all fronts. This perfectly situated residence is directly across the road from the Stocklands Shopping Centre, Close by to schools (Mount Ridley College opposite), parklands and walking trails as well as public transport. The home itself with great size bedrooms, ensuite to the master as well as built in robes plus private balcony, open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, separate guest toilet downstairs, light filled family room which lead's out to a low maintenance secure courtyard. Additional features including double lock up garage, heating and cooling to mention just a few. The home also features a rare MASSIVE rumpus room above the garage, ideal for artists, games and storage or even an office space to work from home. With all the local amenities at your fingertips this one needs to be inspected to be appreciated.
Call Now to Arrange an Inspection!

Description:
Presented with Pride
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented Family home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character. Offering stunning kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, great size master bedroom with his and hers walk in robe, large ensuite, open plan meals area with adjoining family room, rumpus/ theatre room, formal lounge, study to mention just a few.
Step outside and you will find an entertainer's delight with a large decked alfresco area which lead's out to the solar heating inground swimming pool making you the envy of all your friends during the summer months. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, gas log fire, QLD spotted gum flooring throughout the home, beautifully maintained carefree gardens and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & close to parkland. With all the amenities close by including beautiful parklands, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, Splash Aquatic and leisure centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
SIMPLY IRRESISTIBLE!
In a sought after family-focused neighbourhood, this picture-perfect freestanding home is sure to leave a lasting impression with its generous design, immaculate presentation & central location to all of Craigieburn's facilities.
Beyond the gorgeous period-inspired facade, Step inside to discover an impeccable interior comprising a study with ample storage space, 3 double bedrooms (master with walk robe & private ensuite), central bathroom & separate WC, a spacious and light-filled open living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed stone-top kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances.
Other stand out features include, ducted heating, powerful split-system cooling, family sized laundry, remote garage, private pergola setting & beautifully landscaped gardens from front to back.
Located to perfection within seconds of Hothlyn Drive Reserve, walking distance to local buses, trains and a stone's throw away to primary & secondary schools as well as kindergartens and childcare facilities.
All situated within easy access to shopping centres & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
A Flawless Integration of Space & Family Comfort!
Be seduced by this quality built home which is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list. Luxurious living, completed by outstanding workmanship are words rarely strung together in a sentence about a home, but this is all that & more! Walk up towards its impressive grand facade & enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior & warm family character & charm.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms plus study, stunning ensuite & well organised walk-in robe to main, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, brilliant open plan family spaces perfect for large-scale gatherings & state of the art kitchen which needs to be seen to be believed & one to surely please even the most ardent chef. It hosts an abundance of cupboard & bench space & a sense of luxury for the connoisseur cook.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco floored beautifully in eco decking which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration.
Located to perfection a short stroll to a local park, schools, upcoming shopping complex, Craigieburn Central, transport & jam-packed with quality extras including high ceilings, heightened doors, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, double remote garage, roller shutters, stunning central bathroom, roomy laundry with great storage & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.
Insights: 8 Element Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Impressive Family Living
Situated in a quiet pocket of Craigieburn's most sought after locations & presented with love & pride, this impeccable home is sure to ignite your excitement. A fabulous decor, a bright & airy colour palette with a functional floor plan that complements an attractive facade & manicured gardens front to back.
It's smartly configured floor plan comprises a generous separate lounge, a fully equipped kitchen offering plenty of bench space & dishwasher which overlooks a spacious open plan meals & living area that effortlessly links outside to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration. Sleeping quarters including 4 good sized bedrooms, master with walk-in robe & ensuite, & spacious central bathroom.
Step outside, fire up the BBQ & enjoy the home's perfect outdoor setting which provides peace & privacy whilst you entertain all seasons & even enough room for the kids to play out the back in complete privacy. Further features include a single lock up garage with drive thru access, ducted heating & split system cooling, tiles, 6.5kw solar panels, & so much more!
With its as-new feeling, this property is perfect for all first home buyers, investors or downsizers with its perfect proximity to local schools, shops & public transport.

Description:
Style, Comfort And Location
Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Craigieburn, this modern well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers, investors or those looking to downsize. With a tastefully designed exterior you will be impressed with the open plan living which includes ducted heating & split system cooling, kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/living area, 2 great size bedrooms, main bathroom, double lock up garage with remote control entry and so much more.
Centrally located and in one of Craigieburn's most tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. This home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort and with all the amenities close by including shopping centres, public transport & schools. You be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!

Description:
Land & Location with an Eye to the Future!
In a quiet cul-de-sac with instant access to Aitken Creek trails & Craigieburn Gardens, this
single-level home occupies an impressively large allotment (approx 703m2) providing a lifestyle of immediate family function with options to renovate, rebuild or redevelop in the future (STCA).
Well presented throughout, the home's light & bright interior comprises 3 bedrooms (all with
built-in robes), central bathroom & separate WC. Add to this a versatile open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a neat kitchen with timber cabinetry & timber benchtops.
Other features include gas heating & split-system air conditioning, solid timber floors, security shutters & laundry.
Step outside to discover a wonderfully deep north-facing backyard with large storage shed
highlighting the property's generous dimensions & untapped potential, plus the added appeal
of a front carport. Walking distance to Bridgewater Road buses, it also offers easy access to major shopping centres, Craigieburn Station, as well as childcare centres, kindergartens, primary & secondary schools.
Insights: 5 Ealing Close, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
